issue.title: [Rust] ArrowError should implement std::error:Error
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7312](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7312). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ArrowError should implement this trait so that other crates can handle error from this crate more friendly.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7312?focusedCommentId=16989435) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5959
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5959>
